description:
This 4 hour set of “Photoshop Lightroom 3: Adobe Lightroom 3 Tutorial” video lessons cover the important new features of Lightroom 3. Photographer Rob Sylvan demonstrates Lightroom essentials.

Take this Adobe Lightroom 3 Tutorial and learn with Rob Sylvan.

</p>
title: Photoshop Lightroom 3: Video QuickStart Guide
